==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|月|太陰 (月)}}
{{wikipedia|Moon}}
[[File:FullMoon2010.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|太陰}} (''taiin''): the '''[[moon]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|たい|いん|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=たいいん}} {{m|zh|太陰|tr=thaj<sup>H</sup> ʔim|lit=great dark, great [[yin]]||the moon}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']], so either a later borrowing or a later development within Japan.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|たい.いん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たい.いん}}

# the [[moon]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{l|ja|月}}: the [[moon]], the [[lunar cycle]], a [[month]]
* {{ja-r|ムーン}}

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|太陽|たいよう}}: the [[sun]]

=====See also=====
* {{ja-r|恒星|こうせい}}: a [[star]]

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-r|太陰暦|たいいんれき}}
* {{ja-r|太陽太陰暦|たいようたいいんれき}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|たい|おん|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=たいいん}} {{m|zh|太陰|tr=thaj<sup>H</sup> ʔim|lit=great dark, great [[yin]]||the moon}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']], so likely the initial borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|たいおん}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|たいおん}}

# short for {{ja-r|太陰神|^たいおんじん}}, [[goddess]] of the [[moon]] and one of the eight central gods in the [[Onmyōdō]] religion

=====Usage notes=====
This reading appears to be less common than ''Daion'' below.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

===Etymology 3===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|太陰神|太陰 (神)}}
[[File:God of Taion.png|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|太陰}} (''Daion''): the [[Onmyōdō]] '''[[moon]] [[goddess]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|だい|おん|yomi=o}}
Sound shift from ''Taion'' above, replacing the standard [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] and [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] reading of ''tai'' for {{ja-l|太}} with the [[慣用音#Japanese|''kan'yōon'']] of ''dai''.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Probably influenced by the ''dai'' reading of the character {{m|ja|大}}, which is also sometimes used to spell this name, as seen in the illustration at right.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanyo|だいおん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|だいおん}}

# short for {{ja-r|太陰神|^だいおんじん}}, [[goddess]] of the [[moon]] and one of the eight central gods in the [[Onmyōdō]] religion
